messages.title: DON'T RISK IT - EVERY SINGLE VOTE WILL COUNT
messages.content: Some people say Jeremy Corbyn can't possibly become Prime Minister and it doesn't matter how you vote locally in Plymouth Sutton and Devonport. But just remember the opinion polls got the General Election wrong in 2015. They got the EU referendum wrong, and as Jeremy Corbyn has said himself, he was a 200-1 outside chance for the Labour leadership. So in the days of shock election results and global uncertainty, no one can ever really be sure who will win. And with so much at stake, let's not risk it.

messages.title: BACK ME WITH YOUR POSTAL VOTE HERE IN PLYMOUTH SUTTON AND DEVONPORT
messages.content: If you want the best Brexit deal for you and for Britain, then you must make your vote count. That is why I am asking you to back me. And the only way to back me is by voting Conservative in your local constituency of Plymouth Sutton and Devonport. A vote to back me is a vote for strong and stable leadership in the national interest. And your interest, too. A vote to back me is a vote to strengthen my negotiating position, to ensure we get the best Brexit deal possible. And a vote to back me is a vote to guarantee our economic security for the future. So Glen, please give me your backing and your vote. Together we can get on with the job of making life better for all of us.

messages.title: MAKING BREXIT A SUCCESS IS CENTRAL TO OUR NATIONAL INTEREST
messages.content: As a nation, we face the most important period in our lifetime. Making Brexit a success is central to our national interest – and it is central to your own security and prosperity. While there is enormous opportunity for Britain as we leave the European Union, if we do not get this right the consequences will be serious. And they will be felt by ordinary, working people across the country. If we don’t get the Brexit deal right, your economic security and prosperity will be put at risk, and the opportunities you seek for your family will simply not happen. But with your help Glen, together we can get it right.

messages.title: THAT’S WHY I DECIDED WE NEED AN ELECTION NOW
messages.content: By going to Brussels with a strong negotiating hand I can ensure we guarantee our economic security. That means delivering better paying jobs, more affordable housing, a good school place for every child, and a strong economy paying for a strong NHS. But our opponents are already seeking to ruin our chances of getting the best Brexit deal. That is why I needed to make the decision to call a General Election for 8th June - to ask for your backing, so that when I am sitting around the table with the leaders of the 27 other EU countries I have the strongest negotiating hand possible. Remember, there are only two people who can possibly be Prime Minister after the election to negotiate Brexit – me, or Jeremy Corbyn.

messages.title: THE CHOICE IS CLEAR
messages.content: So the choice at this election is clear. Strong and stable leadership with me in the national interest, to see us through Brexit and beyond. Or a hung parliament and coalition of chaos with Jeremy Corbyn. A hung parliament and coalition of chaos will threaten our Brexit negotiations, and every single one of us will pay for it in higher taxes, fewer jobs, more waste and more debt.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May promises strong and stable leadership to navigate Brexit and beyond.
The candidate emphasizes the importance of strengthening her negotiating position to secure the best Brexit deal possible.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A hung parliament and coalition of chaos will threaten our Brexit negotiations.
